roleset.name: drone on about something trivial
roleset.note: WITTER-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Member of VNcls manner_speaking-37.3. (from witter.01-v)

example.name: standard intransitive
example.text: He is very boring and will never use a simple word if there is a longer one available but worst of all - he witters .

example.name: args 0, 1, with DSP
example.text: ["I can also now tell the House," he wittered *trace*-1, "that we are ready to sign tax information exchange agreements with three additional countries . . ."]-1
example.arg: *trace*-1 (tag on the normal parent NP node, sister to rel)
*trace*-1 (tag on the actual word itself, the lowest leaf node)
